additionalProperty.name: Ingredients
additionalProperty.value: Water, Sodium Laureth Sulfate/Sodium C12-13 Pareth Sulfate*, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Dimethiconol, Pearl Extract, Hydrolysed Keratin, Glycerin, PEG-45M, Carbomer, Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Cocamide MEA, TEA-Dodecylbenzenesulfonate, TEA-Sulfate, Glycol Distearate, Sodium Chloride, Citric Acid, Disodium EDTA, Sodium Benzoate, Phenoxyethanol, Fragrance, Citronellol, Geraniol, Limonene, Linalool, CI 60730. *USED INTERCHANGEABLY

additionalProperty.name: Warning
additionalProperty.value: Caution: Use Only As Directed. Avoid Contact With Eyes. If Eye Contact Occurs, Rinse Well With Water Without Delay. If Irritation Occurs, Discontinue Use. This product contains small amounts of hair dye which may cause staining on certain surfaces. If product spills onto surface, wipe off immediately to reduce risk of staining.
